import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
from pathlib import Path

wages_path = Path('Data') / 'wages.csv'
wages_df = pd.read_csv(wages_path)
wages_df['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(wages_df['Date']).dt.to_period('M')

rates_path = Path('Data') / 'interest_rates.csv'
rates_df = pd.read_csv(rates_path)
rates_df['Date'] = pd.to_datetime(rates_df['Date']).dt.to_period('M')

test_df = pd.merge(wages_df, rates_df, on = ['Date'])
